MENTAL-ADD-CP-Q1.header: Would you like to be matched with a mental health coach for 1:1 sessions?

listItems: Research consistently shows that behavioral interventions, such as 1:1 coaching, produce better long-term outcomes than medication alone.

For a limited time, we are offering your first month of coaching for just $49. After your first month, coaching is just $99/month, with no additional fees or co-pays. You can request another coach if itâ€™s not the right fit or opt out anytime.
